name: 4th International Conference on Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality and Computer Graphics
content: SALENTO AVR 2017 intends to bring together researchers from academia and industry, computer scientists, engineers and physicians in order to share points of views, experiences, know-how and technical results related to Virtual and Augmented reality applications, 3D visualization, Computer Graphics, Human-Computer Interaction, games and Serious games.
topics: computer graphics, animation, virtual reality & gaming
